At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. When you reach the current location, what is your Landmark Position relative to the bridge?  
choose:  
A. I am on the left side of the bridge.  
B. I am under the bridge.  
C. I am located above the bridge.  
D. I am located on the right side of the bridge.  
E. I am on the bridge floor.
